frontmatter.title: [Py]String Interpolation
frontmatter.description: There are two existing ways to format Strings. One is string modulo operator(%) and the other is str.format(value). The former is old and the latter is relatively new

frontmatter.title: [JS] Destructuring assignment & Spread Operator
frontmatter.description: The destructuring assignment syntax is a JavaScript expression that makes it possible to unpack values from arrays, or properties from objects, into distinct variables.
